name: Ubiqum Code Academy
description: Ubiqum is a full stack Java and MERN Bootcamp located in the heart of Berlin that focuses on the technologies you need to get a high paying job as a web developer

name: SPICED Academy
description: SPICED Academy has one goal, and that is to make you a rockstar developer and/or data scientists with a six figure salary. We teach both development and data science

name: Ironhack
description: Is coding your passion? Ironhack will give you the skills and the tools to become the best developer possible. We specialize in full stack web development, data analytics and UI/UX design

name: Le Wagon Berlin Bootcamp
description: Have you always wondered about how your applications work? Le Wagon will give you the skills and the tools to build modern web- mobile apps. We specialize in full stack web development and data science
